Cyclist Magazine Podcast episode 83: Carlton Kirby, cycling’s Terry Wogan

This week on the Cyclist Magazine Podcast, James is flying solo. Luckily he’s with the great Carlton Kirby, who makes a living out of talking all day. The legendary Eurosport and GCN commentator talks his new book Sticky Bottle, the new era of commentary, and making mistakes. Recorded before the Tour de France, our conversation also sees Kirby bring out his crystal ball to make some Tour predictions, so even his biggest critics will enjoy this one.

Our chat begins at 4min 33sec.
